trains
Class MessageHeader

java.lang.Object
  trains.MessageHeader

public class MessageHeader
extends java.lang.Object

Stores the header of the message carried by trains protocol for the application using the middleware.

Author:
Stephanie Ouillon

          Length of the whole message
private  char type
          Type of message (contains AM_BROADCAST, AM_ARRIVAL or AM_DEPARTURE), see MessageType
